description: This is a Kotlin source file defining a RecyclerView.Adapter implementation named NotesAdapter for displaying a list of notes in an Android app. The adapter manages a list of Note objects, binds data to views, and handles click events.

classes.name: NotesAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView.Adapter subclass that displays Note objects in a RecyclerView, handling view creation, data binding, and click events.

classes.name: NotesAdapter.NoteViewHolder
classes.description: A RecyclerView.ViewHolder subclass that holds references to views for each note item and binds Note data to these views.

methods.name: submitList
methods.description: Updates the adapter with a new list of Note objects and refreshes the RecyclerView.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates a new ViewHolder by inflating the list item layout.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds a Note object to the ViewHolder at the specified position.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of notes in the list.

methods.name: NoteViewHolder.bind
methods.description: Binds a Note object's title and body to the TextViews in the view holder.
